title: 25(2) of the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act 2022 (No. 42 of 2022) and
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act 

2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions) (No. 3) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited personal injury resolution board act 2022 (commencement certain provisions) (no 3) order 2023

title: 25(2) of the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act 2022 (No. 42 of 2022) and
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2022” means the Personal Injuries Resolution
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2022” means the Personal Injuries Resolution 

Board Act 2022 (No. 42 of 2022).
text_norm: 2 order act 2022 mean personal injury resolution board act 2022 (no 42 2022)

title: 25(2) of the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act 2022 (No. 42 of 2022) and
heading: 3. The 12th day of December 2023 is appointed as the day on which
text_raw:
3. The 12th day of December 2023 is appointed as the day on which 

section 2 of the Act of 2022 shall come into operation.
text_norm: 3 12th day december 2023 appointed day section 2 act 2022 shall come operation

title: 25(2) of the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act 2022 (No. 42 of 2022) and
heading: 4. The 14th day of December 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
4. The 14th day of December 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 

following provisions of the Act of 2022 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 3, insofar as it is not already in operation; 

(b) 

sections 4, 5 and 6; 

(c) 

section 7, insofar as it is not already in operation; 

(d) 

section 8; 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

section 9, insofar as it relates to the insertion of Chapter 1A of 
the Principal Act, with reference to the class of civil action 
referred to in paragraph (a) of section 3 of that Act; 

section 10; 

sections 11, 12, 13 and 17 insofar as they are not already in 
operation; 

(h) 

sections 19, 23 and 24. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 12 December 2023 

DARA CALLEARY, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 

Employment 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th December, 2023.
